trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Denville
There were no other sightings in Denville on or around July 4th 2010
divs: sighting detailsjuly 2010 denville new jersey my name is (*name deleted--sgonzalez\cms) and i live in denville nj. i saw a formation of 7 or 8 lights flying in a nne direction. they were in a "check" formation with more lights on one leg than the other. they passed silently and i only observed them for 3 or 4 seconds. the sky was totally cloudless so i know they weren't reflected lights. they were solid, steady orangeish lights. no pulsing, no flashing. there were no blinking lights of any color associated with them. because i couldn't guess the altitude i have no reference to there size other than to say they would be about the size of a 20 inch object seen at 45-50 feet. there was no trail behind them and they moved in a straight line. i was outside on my deck talking to a friend who was waiting to catch a flight in california. i was sitting back looking up in a northerly direction. they entered my line of sight from behind and to the left, flying out of sight over the roof in a nne direction. has anyone else reported anything similar at that time on that date? i did not make any other report of this incident to any official government organization as i was waiting to see if there were any news stories in the paper that would confirm what i saw, but nothing has been printed. if you wish anymore details, and i'm sure i haven't thought of everything you might want to know. after checking with my friend, according to her phone log we spoke from 2:10 to 2:54 so the time of the sighting was closer to 2:30 am. our property backs up on rt 80 with a tall sound barrier in between. at that time of the morning there is very little traffic. as i said earlier, the sky was clear so there was no cloud deck to reflect lights. furthermore the direction of travel of the objects was perpendicular to the highway. i am not a trained observer, have not served in the military or law enforcement. i am 48 yrs old and work for (**work info and home address deleted--sgonzalez\cms) nj if you wish to check an on line map. the objects didn't flash by nor did they just drift. at the speed they were moving and as quiet as it was then i would have expected to hear some noise but there was none. they were not fireworks and the precision of the formation leads me to believe they were not space debris or meteors. i hope this info helps. note: ken pfeifer state director of investigations spoke to the witness today 7-7-10. we are getting more info about this sighting.
Summary: 7 orange lights in formation flew over.
